notes: Spacious modern apartment with clean white finishes, recessed lighting, and light wood flooring throughout. The unit has multiple bedrooms, open living/dining areas with good natural light from large windows, and built-in storage. For baby safety, the balcony has floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors with metal railings visible outside; furniture corners are rounded but some sharp cabinet edges exist. Overall very clean and well-maintained condition with no visible red flags.
